Articles.Content:
The New Light 1 probe, orbiting the Mun has achieved it's main goal and it's optional goal! I sent it up with a rocket that had way too much DV and a whole stage of wasted DV I didnt need, but because of that I achieved the optional goal for the probe, by jettisoning the waste fuel stage and adjusting the Probes orbit so the debris never got anywhere near the probe, I have made a failsafe kind of thing for Kerballed Mun landings, so if theres a fuel shortage they can Rendezvous with the tank almost completely full of fuel, and use some KAS ports to take the fuel incase of emergency! Here is an album.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
(P.S. If that doesn't show up as an imbedded album please tell me how to make it an imbedded album!)

This is my first ever Mun orbit and I love it!

Edited July 22, 2015 by Vanamonde
Your first mun probe has PB-NUKs?

You can embed an album like this:

[imgur]yA5RO[/imgur]

Your first mun probe has PB-NUKs?

Obviously not career mode.
Still cool though. Come on, you cant expect his first mun probe to be in career.
Well I was just surprised. If his first mun probe has PB-NUKs, think what his Jool expedition will have! Warp engines and energy shields and stuff!
Sharkman Briton, I fixed your album for you. You can see the format by choosing "edit post" and then "switch editor to source mode" (the right-most button on the edit menu).

Sharkman Briton, I fixed your album for you. You can see the format by choosing "edit post" and then "switch editor to source mode" (the right-most button on the edit menu).

Thanks a bunch matey!
This report of a mission has been moved to Mission Reports.
